means: 否认，否认与…有关系，断绝与…的关系( disown的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Those comments were later disowned by an official army spokesman.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些话随后遭到了军方一位官方发言人的否认。

sentence.Network_en: Her family disowned her for marrying a foreigner.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的家人因她嫁给了外国人而与她断绝关系。
他声明与堕落的儿子脱离关系.

PerfectNetExp.abs: disorption 解吸, disowned 背了, disown 驱逐
Her family disowned her for marrying a gentile ., 她的家庭坚决不同意她嫁给一名异教徒.

list.abs: she had never once dared think about telling her plight to her parents , for fear of being disowned .她从来没有敢想过把她的苦闷告诉她的父母，怕和他们断绝关系。
your father disowned you because you have sinned., 你的父亲否认你因为你的罪.
but Peter insisted emphatically , " Even if I have to die with you , I will never disown you . " And all the others said the same . ( Gethsemane .彼得却极力的说，我就是必须和你同死，也总不能不认你。众门徒都是这样说。
what if my parents disown me ?如果我的父母不认我？

entry.tran: 与…断绝关系;否认对…的责任;否认…是自己的
entry.def: If you disown someone or something, you say or show that you no longer want to have any connection with them or any responsibility for them.

example.ex: The man who murdered the girl is no son of mine. I disown him.
example.tran: 杀害那女孩的人不配做我的儿子。我要与他脱离关系。

example.ex: Those comments were later disowned by an official army spokesman.
example.tran: 这些话随后遭到了军方一位官方发言人的否认。

auth_sentence.content: Her family had disowned her and turned her out.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her family had disowned her and turned her out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her family had disowned her and turned her out.

auth_sentence.content: If God manifested Himself...He would be quickly disowned.
auth_sentence.res_content: If God manifested Himself...He would be quickly disowned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If God manifested Himself...He would be quickly disowned.

auth_sentence.content: Dr Cable disowned Liberal Democrat calls for Mr Osborne to be replaced.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dr Cable disowned Liberal Democrat calls for Mr Osborne to be replaced.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dr Cable disowned Liberal Democrat calls for Mr Osborne to be replaced.
